metadata.title: CVE-2019-16319 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In Wireshark 3.0.0 to 3.0.3 and 2.6.0 to 2.6.10, the Gryphon dissector could go into an infinite loop. This was addressed in plugins/epan/gryphon/packet-gryphon.c by checking for a message length of zero.

criterions.comment: wireshark package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.4-1ubuntu1').
